00020 #include "segment.h"
00021 
00022 namespace RDK2 { namespace Geometry {
00023 
00024 // Sedgewick's algorithm (segments intersection)
00025 int sedgewick_ccw(const Point2d& p0, const Point2d& p1, const Point2d& p2)
00026 {
00027     double dx1 = p1.x - p0.x;
00028     double dy1 = p1.y - p0.y;
00029     double dx2 = p2.x - p0.x; 
00030     double dy2 = p2.y - p0.y;
00031     if (dx1*dy2 > dy1*dx2) return +1;
00032     if (dx1*dy2 < dy1*dx2) return -1;
00033     if ((dx1*dx2 < 0) || (dy1*dy2 < 0)) return -1;
00034     if ((dx1*dx1+dy1*dy1) < (dx2*dx2+dy2*dy2)) return +1;
00035     return 0;
00036 }
00037 
00038 // Sedgewick's algorithm (segments intersection)
00039 bool sedgewickIntersect(const Point2d& s0p0, const Point2d& s0p1, const Point2d& s1p0, const Point2d& s1p1)
00040 {
00041     return ((sedgewick_ccw(s0p0, s0p1, s1p0) * sedgewick_ccw(s0p0, s0p1, s1p1)) <= 0)
00042         && ((sedgewick_ccw(s1p0, s1p1, s0p0) * sedgewick_ccw(s1p0, s1p1, s0p1)) <= 0);
00043 }
